content: RAK Studios is a recording studio complex with residential facilities located near Regent's Park in central London, United Kingdom. It was founded in 1976 by English record producer Mickie Most. RAK has four recording rooms. Studios 1 and  2 house API desks; Studio 3 has a vintage Neve VRP Legend console (previously at Abbey Road Studios' Studio 2); and Studio 4 contains an SSL 4056 desk.The RAK complex was a Victorian school and church hall.
